This property verifies that the Mdo signal becomes 0 exactly one clock cycle after the Reset signal is asserted. 

The property triggers on every positive edge of the Clk signal, but is disabled when Reset is 0. When Reset becomes 1, the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, Mdo must be 0. If this condition is not met, the assertion fails.
